official_title: A bill to permit the Capital Yacht Club of the District of Columbia to borrow money without regard to the usury laws of the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Permits the Capital Yacht Club of the District of Columbia to borrow money without regard to the usury laws of the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to permit the Capital Yacht Club of the District of Columbia to borrow money without regard to the usury laws of the District of Columbia.
